snippet: Tere O’Connor is bringing the four parts of his “Bleed” project to the American Dance Festival in Durham, N.C., the first time these works will be performed together in one place.
abstract: Four dance works by choreographer Tere O'Connor, which constitute his project Bleed, will be performed together for the first time at American Dance Festival in Durham, NC.
lead_paragraph: Tere O’Connor is bringing the four parts of his “Bleed” project to the American Dance Festival in Durham, N.C., the first time these works will be performed together in one place.

headline.seo: Tere O’Connor Brings Together All the Parts of ‘Bleed’
headline.main: Feet Planted on a Choreographic Riddle
headline.print_headline: Feet Planted on a Choreographic Riddle
